dcterms:creator: Alex Ray
Joshua Achiam
Dario Amodei
dcterms:description: A testing platform where the RL agent is represented as a simple robot that can actuate forward/backward and rotate clockwise/anti-clockwise, tasked with navigating to a randomly generated goal.
dcterms:title: Point-Goal

dcterms:creator: Alex Ray
Joshua Achiam
Dario Amodei
dcterms:description: A testing platform where the RL agent is represented by a robot with two-independent wheels and a free-rolling wheel, tasked with navigating to a randomly generated goal, featuring more complex system dynamics.
dcterms:title: Car-Goal
